column1: Baby Barnaby's////Now for the food -- I ordered the Green Eggs (of course)
column2: which were complimented with breakfast potatoes
column3: chicken apple sausage and toast (but I opted for a biscuit). The results? WOWWW. I am not exaggerating when I say that EVERY SINGLE BITE was more heavenly than the last. Everything on my plate was just so gosh darn tasty! The eggs scrambled with spinach
column4: artichoke & jack cheese make an outstanding combination. The potatoes were cooked to a perfectly crisp golden brown. Chicken apple sausage never fails to satisfy my taste buds and even the biscuit was buttery
column6: and gone with every crumb. Two thumbs way up. My friend ordered the blueberry pancake
column8: but was more excited about my food than his plate.
